full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA SDUD PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @055A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA YON TAN RIN PO CHE SDUD PA TSIGS SU BCAD PA LAS YONGS SU GTAD PA'I LE'U ZHES BYA BA STE SUM RTZA GNYIS PA'O, ,YANG DAG LAM GYI GO 'PHANG LA 'JUG 'JIG RTEN PA YIS BDE BLAG RAB TU THOB BYA'I PHYIR, ,THUGS RJE MNGA' PAS PHAN PAR DGONGS NAS BCOM LDAN SANGS RGYAS NYID KYIS YANG DAG LEGS PAR GSUNGS @055B MDO YI GNAS LA CHOS KYI DE NYID MA LUS TE RNAMS THOS NAS YANG DAG MNYAM 'JOG PA'I, ,GANG ZHIG GNAS SU GYUR LA RANG NYID DRI MA DANG BRAL NYIN DANG MTSAN DU BSAM GTAN BYA, ,DUS NI MANG POR SDUG BSNGAL GYIS DGUGS BRTZON PA DANG BCAS GLOG PA RING DU GYUR BA STE, ,TSIGS BCAD DBYE BA DU MA'I PO TIR GYUR BA MTHONG NAS DA NI GZHAN DANG LDAN GYUR BA'I, ,RGOL BA'I GLANG PO'I DBANG PO BUM PA 'JOMS BYED GANG ZHIG 'GRO BA'I DON LA LEGS SBYANGS PA'I, ,SENGGE BZANG PO BDAG GIS LEGS PAR BSGRUBS PA 'DI NI BLO LDAN RNAMS KYIS THANG PAR GYIS, ,'PHAGS MA BCOM LDAN MA SHES RAB PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA BRGYAD STONG PA'I RJES SU 'BRANG PA'I BCOM LDAN @056A *, ,'DAS MA YON TAN RIN PO CHE BSDUS PA TSIGS SU BCAD PA RDZOGS SO, ,DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA KHYED SKU CI 'DRA DANG, ZHES PA NAS, CHOS DANG BKRA SHIS 'PHEL BAR MDZAD DEU GSOL, ,STON PA 'JIG RTEN KHAMS SU 'BYON PA DANG, BSTAN PA NYI 'OD BZHIN DU GSAL BA DANG, 'DZIN PHU NU BZHIN DU MTHUN PA YIS, ,BSTAN PA YUN RING GNAS PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG , ,,*, ,AOm SVA STI, RGYAL BA'I GZUNG RAB KUN GYI RAB DANG PHUL, ,SHER PHYIN MDO MCHOG BSDUD PA'I GLEGS BAM 'DI, RAB DKAR DANG LDAN RNAMS KYIS CHOS SBYIN MCHOG ,RGYU CHER SPEL PHYIR KHAL KHA KHU RE CHE'I, ,CHOS GRVA CHEN PO KUN DGA' CHOS GLING DU, ,SPAR DU BSKRUN PA'I DGE MTHU RGYAL BSTAN DANG, @056B ^DAM PA'I ZHABS BRTAN 'BREL THOG YUL KUN DGA' CHOS GLING DU, ,SRONG MTHAR DAR RGYAS YUN RING NAS PA DANG, BLO GSAL MKHAS MCHOG KYIS YONGS GANG BAS, ,THUB BSTAN PHYOGS KUN RGYAS PA'I GZHIR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,(GTZO BYAS PA'I, ,'GRO KUN RING MIN BYANG CHEN THOB GYUR CIG , ,,MKHAS MAS BLO GSAL KUN DGA' CHOS KYI GLING, ,)
